msbt.message: I was nervous about moving to this island, but your gift made me feel so welcome! I want you to know how grateful I am for your sweet gesture, and I hope you'll accept this present from me in return.

Thank you for your welcome gift! Is it that obvious that I'm still not totally settled in here? Either way, that was really thoughtful of you. I'm enclosing something for you so I can return your kindness.

Your thoughtful gift made me feel so welcome here on this island! I feel a lot less unsettled now, and that's all thanks to you. I hope you'll let me give you this present in return to show my appreciation.
Even though I've barely moved in here, I already have a note from you to make me feel welcome! I'm really grateful that you wrote to me. I just hope everyone else feels like I'm that approachable!
There's so much to get used to after moving to a new place. Your note made me feel that, for the first time, this really is going to be my home. I hope this means the two of us will be good friends!

It was so sweet of you to send me a note welcoming me to my new home! If everyone else here is as kind as you, I'm sure I'm going to love this place! I can't wait to get to know everyone on the island!
